name: 王泰典
objective: 透過正應力、剪應力、扭矩與彎矩以及相應的應變介紹，描述材料受力作用下的物理現象，使學習者對於材料力學的理論與應用，有清晰和全面的瞭解。
schedule:
Week 01: Introduction
Week 02: Ch 01 Stress
Week 03: Ch 02 Strain
Week 04: Ch 03 Mechanical properties of materials + Ch 04 Design concepts
Week 05: Ch 05 Axial deformation
Week 06: Ch 06 Torsion (Quit #1)
Week 07: Ch 07 Equilibrium of beams
Week 08: Ch 08 Bending
Week 09: Ch 09 Shear stress in beams (Quit #2)
Week 10: Ch 10 Beam deflections
Week 11: Ch 11 Statically indeterminate beams
Week 12: Ch 12 Stress transformations
Week 13: Ch 13 Strain transformations
Week 14: Ch 14 Thin-walled pressure vessels (Quit #3)
Week 15: Ch 15 Combined loads
Week 16: Ch 16 Columns (Final)
scorePolicy:
四次考試佔85%。
課堂反應與表現佔15%。
materials: Philpot, T.A., 2008, Mechanics of materials: An integrated learning system, John Wiley & Sons Inc. (歐亞書局代理)
